title: Dealmaster: Save on Dell XPS 15, smartwatches, and more
content:
In another world, the arrival of summer might mean you're off to the beach—but for some of us, it's just as likely that we'll stay glued to that computer monitor. Fortunately, we have some solid deals on monitors—and of course, computers and peripherals to plug into them—along with wearables and smartphones today. Staying inside to avoid the humidity? No problem. Today's Dealmaster has some solid deals on office chairs and cable management, too. Here's what we've found.

Smartwatches, smartphones, and wearables

Galaxy Watch 4 and Watch 4 Classic. (credit: Samsung)

  • Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 Pro for $400 (was $450) at Best Buy
  • Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 with extra wireless charger for $280 (was $310) at Samsung
  • Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic in stainless steel for $330 (was $430) at Best Buy
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 smartphone for $1,470 (was $1,920) at Amazon
  • Garmin vivoactive 4S for $200 (was $350) at Best Buy
  • Garmin Venu 2 45 mm for $300 (was $350) at Best Buy

Laptops and tablets

(credit: Valentina Palladino)

  • Samsung Galaxy Book 3 Pro from $1,450 (was $1,750) at Samsung
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 from $700 (was $780) at Samsung
  • Dell XPS 15 with 12th Gen Intel Core i7 and RTX 3050 from $1,149 (was $1,899) at Dell
  • Dell XPS 17 with 13th Gen Intel Core i9 and RTX 4080 from $3,649 (was $4,149) at Dell
  • Dell XPS 15 with 12th Gen Intel Core i9 and RTX 3050 Ti from $2,349 (was $2,899) at Dell
  • Dell Inspiron 16 with 12th Gen Intel Core i5 from $650 (was $850) at Dell
  • Lenovo Yoga 7i 16-inch with 12th Gen Intel Core i7 for $1,070 with YOGA7OFFER coupon (was $1,580) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo ThinkBook 15 Gen 4 with 12th Gen Intel Core i5 for $899 with THINKMAY2SAVE coupon (was $1,499) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 with 12th Gen Intel Core i5 for $642 with THINKSPECIALSAVE coupon (was $1,619) at Lenovo

Monitors and displays

The $2,500 Odyssey Neo G9. (credit: Samsung)

  • Samsung Odyssey Neo G7 43-inch 4K monitor for $700 (was $1,000) at Samsung
  • Samsung Odyssey Ark 55-inch 4K curved monitor for $2,000 (was $3,000) at Samsung
  • Samsung ViewFinity S65UA 34-inch WQHD curved monitor for $470 (was $700) at Samsung
  • Samsung ViewFinity S80TB 27-inch 4K Thunderbolt 4 monitor for $430 (was $600) at Samsung
  • Samsung ViewFinity S80A 32-inch 4K monitor $370 (was $470) at Samsung

Keyboards and mice

The Logitech MX Keys. This is the Mac version, but a Windows version is also available. (credit: Jeff Dunn)

  • Logitech MX Keys with number pad for $110 (was $120) at Amazon
  • Logitech MX Master 3s mouse for $98 (was $110) at Amazon
  • Logitech ERGO K860 keyboard for $122 (was $130) at Amazon

Office chairs

  • Duramont ergonomic mesh office chair for $230 after coupon (was $330) at Amazon
  • Sytas office chair with high back design for $170 after coupon (was $200) at Amazon

Office organization

  • 192-piece cable management kit for $15 (was $20) at Amazon
  • 100-piece reusable cable ties for $7 (was $14) at Amazon
  • 20-pack silicone cable ties for $8 (was $12) at Amazon
  • HumanCentric Vertical Laptop Stand for $35 (was $40) at Amazon
